verses.verse: My son, <WH1121> forget <WH7911> not my law; <WH8451> but let your heart <WH3820> keep <WH5341> my commandments: <WH4687>
For length <WH753> of days, <WH3117> and long <WH753> life, <WH2416> and peace, <WH7965> shall they add <WH3254> to you.
Let not mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> forsake <WH5800> you: bind <WH7194> them about <WH5921> your neck; <WH1621> write <WH3789> them on the table <WH3871> of your heart: <WH3820>
So shall you find <WH4672> favor <WH2580> and good <WH2896> understanding <WH7922> in the sight <WH5869> of God <WH430> and man. <WH120>
Trust <WH982> in the LORD <WH3068> with all <WH3605> your heart; <WH3820> and lean <WH8172> not to your own understanding. <WH998>
In all <WH3605> your ways <WH1870> acknowledge <WH3045> him, and he shall direct <WH3474> your paths. <WH734>
Be not wise <WH2450> in your own eyes: <WH5869> fear <WH3372> the LORD, <WH3068> and depart <WH5493> from evil. <WH7451>
It shall be health <WH7500> to your navel, <WH8270> and marrow <WH8250> to your bones. <WH6106>
Honor <WH3513> the LORD <WH3068> with your substance, <WH1952> and with the first fruits <WH7225> of all <WH3605> your increase: <WH8393>
So shall your barns <WH618> be filled <WH4390> with plenty, <WH7647> and your presses <WH3342> shall burst <WH6555> out with new <WH8492> wine. <WH8492>
My son, <WH1121> despise <WH3988> not the chastening <WH4148> of the LORD; <WH3068> neither <WH408> be weary <WH6973> of his correction: <WH8433>
For whom <WH853> <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> loves <WH157> he corrects; <WH3198> even as a father <WH1> the son <WH1121> in whom he delights. <WH7521>
Happy <WH835> is the man <WH120> that finds <WH4672> wisdom, <WH2451> and the man <WH120> that gets <WH6329> understanding. <WH8394>
For the merchandise <WH5504> of it is better <WH2896> than the merchandise <WH5505> of silver, <WH3701> and the gain <WH8393> thereof than fine gold. <WH2742>
She is more precious <WH3368> than rubies: <WH6443> and all <WH3605> the things you can desire <WH2656> are not to be compared <WH7737> to her.
Length <WH753> of days <WH3117> is in her right <WH3225> hand; <WH3225> and in her left <WH8040> hand <WH8040> riches <WH6239> and honor. <WH3519>
Her ways <WH1870> are ways <WH1870> of pleasantness, <WH5278> and all <WH3605> her paths <WH5410> are peace. <WH7965>
She is a tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> to them that lay hold <WH2388> on her: and happy <WH833> is every one that retains <WH8551> her.
The LORD <WH3068> by wisdom <WH2451> has founded <WH3245> the earth; <WH776> by understanding <WH8394> has he established <WH3559> the heavens. <WH8064>
By his knowledge <WH1847> the depths <WH8415> are broken <WH1234> up, and the clouds <WH7834> drop <WH7491> down <WH7491> the dew. <WH2919>
My son, <WH1121> let not them depart <WH3868> from your eyes: <WH5869> keep <WH5341> sound <WH8454> wisdom <WH8454> and discretion: <WH4209>
So shall they be life <WH2416> to your soul, <WH5315> and grace <WH2580> to your neck. <WH1621>
Then <WH227> shall you walk <WH3212> in your way <WH1870> safely, <WH983> and your foot <WH7272> shall not stumble. <WH5062>
When <WH518> you lie <WH7901> down, <WH7901> you shall not be afraid: <WH6342> yes, you shall lie <WH7901> down, <WH7901> and your sleep <WH8142> shall be sweet. <WH6149>
Be not afraid <WH3372> of sudden <WH6597> fear, <WH6343> neither of the desolation <WH7722> of the wicked, <WH7563> when <WH3588> it comes. <WH935>
For the LORD <WH3068> shall be your confidence, <WH3689> and shall keep <WH8104> your foot <WH7272> from being taken. <WH3921>
Withhold <WH4513> not good <WH2896> from them to whom it is due, <WH1167> when it is in the power <WH410> of your hand <WH3027> to do <WH6213> it.
Say <WH559> not to your neighbor, <WH7453> Go, <WH3212> and come <WH7725> again, <WH7725> and to morrow <WH4279> I will give; <WH5414> when you have <WH3426> it by you.
Devise <WH2790> not evil <WH7451> against <WH5921> your neighbor, <WH7453> seeing he dwells <WH3427> securely <WH983> by you.
Strive <WH7378> not with a man <WH120> without <WH2600> cause, <WH2600> if <WH518> he have done <WH1580> you no <WH3808> harm. <WH7451>
Envy <WH7065> you not the oppressor, <WH376> <WH2555> and choose <WH977> none <WH408> of his ways. <WH1870>
For the fraudulent <WH3868> is abomination <WH8441> to the LORD: <WH3068> but his secret <WH5475> is with the righteous. <WH3477>
The curse <WH3994> of the LORD <WH3068> is in the house <WH1004> of the wicked: <WH7563> but he blesses <WH1288> the habitation <WH5116> of the just. <WH6662>
Surely <WH518> he scorns <WH3887> the scorners: <WH3887> but he gives <WH5414> grace <WH2580> to the lowly. <WH6041>
The wise <WH2450> shall inherit <WH5157> glory: <WH3519> but shame <WH7036> shall be the promotion <WH7311> of fools. <WH3684>
